Wow numba 2

If you like destroying robots and turning a friendly into evil while solving puzzles? This game is for you! The storyline of the game tells the history and the reason of the existence of Aperture Science, GLaDos, and about the life of Cave Johnson. It still have loopholes in the storyline. I hope Valve would cover this in a prequel or a sequel. I am pretty sure you, your family and friends will enjoy this because it has a multiplayer mode. You can play it even though you don't have family or friends like the test subject named "Chell!" You can try "Tests" from Steam community. You will never get bored playing this game. It's a 10/10.
Hours of fun for the whole family. If your family enjoys physics puzzles, portal creation, post-apocalyptic-corporate-industrial atmosphere, tongues in cheeks, and potatoes.

Pour moi, ce jeu est génial, l'histoire est parfaite (faut connaitre le portal 1), les musiques sont les meilleurs au monde, 10/10 !

Un de mes jeux préférés!
Le scenario prend un peu plus le dessus que dans le un et quelle joie! L'humour est encore plus présent (notamment avec l'arrivé de ce nouveau personnage qu'est Wheatley).
Les énigmes sont bien plus durs, sans être impossible, faut juste se creuser un peu les méninges ;)

Si on aime les jeux d'énigmes avec un scenar sur la survie, ce jeu est fait pour vous!

awesome gam.

A real masterpiece by Valve  - unforgettable humour, atmosphere, voices. The game catches you from the first minute and it wont let you go until the last minute of your walkthrough. The puzzles that you have to solve have become somehow more easy but more interesting - i loved them a lot. Industrial locations that slowly transformed into aperture laboratories of 60s, 70s  and so on are stunning. So, this is one of the best games that you can bu on steam, this is worth its price!
Puzzles!
Sometimes I wish I would've never played this game just so I could start it from the beginning without knowing how the story will progress.
로봇으로 인간의 감성을 말하다. 졸업작품으로 만든 게임이 모티브가 되어 제작되어졌다는 사실이 놀라우면서도 게임을 하는 내내 더 놀라게 되는 게임. 게임의 색다른 가능성을 느껴볼 수 있었다.

Portal 2 é muito bom, se você não gosta de pensar, esse jogo não é para você kkk

como o primeiro jogo Portal, o 2 não sofreu alterações ( na mecânica do jogo ) apenas adições e ferramentas que deixaram o jogo fantástico, como aqueles géis ( ou tinta como preferirem ) que permite você correr mais rápido, pular mais auto e colocar químicas nas paredes que não tem para criar outros portais. 

esse jogo tem um problema, ele vicia, você cria um portal, depois outro e outro e assim por diante, a história, o enredo do jogo  são completamente envolventes, e isso me agradou muito.

Portal 2 is a great, hilarious, well thought out sequel to a great, hilarious, and well thought out game. Puzzles are fun and intuitive, the commentary is great, potatoglados is funny, and hey, workshop.
Portal 2 was as much fun as the original game and then some. The gameplay is fantastic and the story-line is solid. The co-op mode is also fun and challenging.
One of those games that just raise the bar of gaming that little bit higher.

This is probably one of the best Puzzle games I've ever played. I played both Portal and Portal 2, and this one is superior in the series. If you want an amazing Puzzle game that isn't overly difficult, this is the game you want. Portal 2 is also really funny with dialogs from Wheatly and Cave Johnson, as well as your typical whitty comments from GlAd0s. BUY THIS GAME

Un gioco perfetto nel suo genere, un susseguirsi di puzzle e di gag davvero esilaranti.
La storia che fa da cornice non è banale e nella modalità giocatore singolo è interessante scoprirla puzzle dopo puzzle.
La modalità co-op permette di risolvere altri puzzle in compagnia di un amico (stupenda).

This game was very fun and I beat it in two days. BEWARE THIS GAME IS ADDICTING!!! worth every penny and fun never stops with the user created levels

Simplemente... ¡GENIAL!
Espectacular juego. Gráficos excelentes, animaciones espectaculares y diálogos ''hermosos''. Te compenetras con la historia, es muy atrapante, o por lo menos para mi gusto lo es. También es muy gracioso, GLaDOS es una de las mejores cosas del juego, sus repetidos intentos de matarte hacen aún mas atrapante la historia, aunque no lo crean. El extra que termina de completar el juego es la canción de los títulos cuando lo terminás. Es simplemente genial escuchar a un personaje (que no quiero nombrar por no hacer spoiler) diciéndote todas esas cosas en una canción.

RESUMEN:

Gráficos: Excelentes (Incluyendo animaciones y el ''diseño'')
Historia: PERFECTA y ATRAPANTE
Puzzles: Muy difíciles y entretenidos. MUY BUENOS
''Narración'': Para mi una de las cosas que le da esa ''esencia'' al juego es la ''narración'' de GLaDOS
CO-OP: Excelente, muchas herramientas para ''comunicarse'' con el compañero. Puzzles MUY complicados, que es otro PRO e incluye modo pantalla dividida.
Editor de Mapas: Bueno. Es un poco complicado hacer mapas, si bien no tiene herramientas complicadas de usar no es nada fácil hacer mapas, pero si uno se toma el tiempo suficiente y se esfuerza se logran mapas hasta mejores que los que incluye el juego, eso lo pueden comprobar en el workshop.

Nota: 9.50 - 10
(Mi Opinión)

Great game. Really cool with the coop and some of the puzzles keep you thinking for a bit. I like it sooo much better than the first. Finished it once not on steam and am on my second playthrough. So far so great second time around.

What can I say about this game that hasn't already been said.  This game does what every game should do at the most basic level; entertain.  From beginning to Portal 2 is entertaining and engaging.  Easily one of the best if not the best game I have ever played
This game is definently my favorite of all time. I can not wait for Portal 3.
Played the first one, then jumped right into the second.  It is an amazing game and very fun.

A masterpiece. One of the best games I've ever played. Takes the brilliance and innovation of the original Portal and expands on it into a fully-fledged title. Maintains an extremely high standard of writing from start to finish. Characters are hilarious. Gameplay is original. Fantastic atmosphere. Puzzles are challenging but not frustatingly so. Valve never fails to impress and Portal 2 is no exception.

Absolutely amazing game, one of the best I've ever played.

One of the best games ive ever played the story line is very deep if you have played still alive (the first one) and the humor is absolutley brilliant its awesome how they made a game so serious and funny at the same time this is one of those games that you can keep replaying without ever getting bored of it
El juego se define en solo una palabra, Excelente. Otra joya maestra mas de valve, juegazo!

Портал - это поистене уникальный продукт, vavle в очередной раз показали высший класс. Гемплей не блещет " не ожиданными поворотами" , но является хорошим учебником по вселенной. Основная игра раскрывается в входе в мастерскую, там вас ожидают огромное облако карт, как для прохождения одному, так и для ко-оп игры. Я рекомендую эту игру всем, но особенно она хороша при ко-оп с другом или подругой ;)
Great game. Pretty puzzling. Makes you think a lot. The story is amazing.

Want a challenge? Like a puzzle? This is the game for you! I highly recommend this game as a casual play and something for a bit of a try hard. The game mechanics are good and it does start to hurt your head :P but this is a great game and highly recommend it. Make sure to play Portal 1 first as you may not understand the story but I highly recommend it. 8/10
The best game......... IN THE WORLD
So good game that I'm waiting Portal 3 instead of wait HL3
Portal on steroids. 'Nuff said. Kidding. Wheatley is a hilarious addition and the gels and such make for even more interesting gameplay. Portal made you think, Portal 2 makes you think more.
One of the best co-op games ive ever played
really good game everyone should have this
Awesome game! 8/10

The challenge mode is amazingly competitive and I love it, and there's just so much to do if you explore things, I've got 1500 hours in this game now. Thumbs up for me

포탈2는 예전 복돌이로 포탈1을 하였으나 스팀을 얻게되고 바로 포탈2를 사서 친구와 코옵도 깨보았습니다.
포탈2는 밸브 게임들의 물리엔진이 몸소 느껴지며, 깔끔한 그래픽에 그리 높지 않은 사양을 요구합니다.
포탈 시리즈는 번들로 친구와 함께 구매하여, 코옵까지 깨는걸 추천합니다.
코옵은 협동게임으로 강한 협동심이 있어야하고, 싱글(스토리진행)과 다르게 코옵은 꽤나 난이도가 있으며,
코옵으로 특유 동작을 취할수있는것이 가장 흥미로웠습니다.
포탈시리즈의 스토리는 하프라이프의 일정부분과 연결되어있는것으로 기억합니다.
그런 스토리를 인터넷에서 찾아본다면, 게임을 다깨고도 작은 스토리를 찾아보기위해 게임에 다시 접속하여
다시 되새기며 깨는 즐거움도 있습니다.

포탈2는 스토리 진행보다 코옵이 굉장히 재미있었습니다.
코옵에 둘이서만 할수있는 동작은 거의 절정이죠!
만약 포탈2를 염두해두고 계신다면 친구를 꼬드겨 꼭 함께 구매하세요!
este juego me encanta, ¡es genial!

Crazy. No way to fully enjoy unless one has an extremely good perception of how the game works, which takes a while to get used to. Then there's the mysterious plot behind the whole reason why there's human test subjects and why the crazy facility was built. There's tons of hidden places where one will find clues to the story behind the facility. So be just as crazy and try this game out for yourself.
Portal 2 is a great game but make sure you buy portal 1 so you can understand easier. This is also a very challenging game, hope you're in for a challenge!
